body: I see that Dark wood was added to the - soon to be added list - awesome!. I just thought of one thing that needs to be taken into consideration. Donators can /surface - this map is an enclosed walls map so donators can /surface to the top of the covering bedrock. Can the surface command be disabled or can a damage or tp zone be added to the top so that it either kills the user or it tp them to spawn. Thanks! ( unless the tp command does not tp through bedrock)

title: Dark Wood ( question for para or evo )
